Container.Name: Discord-LLM-Bot
Container.Overview:
OpenLLM - A powerful Discord assistant platform powered by Large Language Models.
Features: - Multi-LLM Support (Gemini, OpenAI, Anthropic, OpenRouter, local models) - Modern web dashboard for configuration and monitoring - Web-based setup wizard (runs on first start) - Plugin system for extensions - Built-in web search and tools
FIRST TIME SETUP: 1. Start the container 2. Visit http://YOUR-SERVER-IP:5050/setup in your browser 3. Complete the web setup wizard 4. Dashboard will be available at http://YOUR-SERVER-IP:5000
The web setup wizard only runs on first start or when configuration is missing.
